description: MALKIY Sofa was named after a king and priest mentioned in the Book of Genesis whose name means justice and king of righteousness. This tuxedo red velvet sofa has legs in aged golden leaf, making it the perfect addition to a modern classic living room set. The MALKIY Tuxedo Velvet Sofa is sure to make a statement in any room it is in.

Known as traders, the Ottawa is a Native American tribe from Manitoulin Island. This tribe inspired the creation of OTTAWA Sofa. Featuring synthetic leather upholstery and a frame bordered with bronze polished nails, this camelback sofa will give a contemporary touch to any room. The OTTAWA is a modern contemporary three seater black sofa making it the perfect addition to your living room design.

PLUM is a throwback to the past with a contemporary touch. This fully upholstered leather sofa celebrates grandeur and opulence highlighted by the synthetic leather that surrounds it. The PLUM Leather Sofa will add a sophisticated feel as well as an extra touch of elegance to any modern living room set.

The Northern Lights are one of the most mesmerising natural phenomena in the world. Its beauty inspired our designers to create SAARI Sofa. Upholstered in cotton velvet and with a base in brushed aged brass matte, this blue lounge sofa will bring comfort and elegance to any living room set.

The Dakota is a Native American tribe, they compose two of the three main subcultures of the Sioux people, and are typically divided into the Eastern Dakota and Western Dakota. BRABBU´s passion for the worldwide cultures aroused the desire to create DAKOTA Velvet Single Sofa, as a homage to this North-American indigenous tribe.

According to Greek mythology, Oreas is the God of the mountains. OREAS Single Sofa pays tribute to it. This channel-tufted single sofa is fully upholstered in soft cotton velvet, making it the perfect addition to any modern home design be it a living room, reading corner or even bedroom.

Otters are known for being playful animals, with a high capacity to adapt to the environment. Inspired by the nature of this animal, the OTTER Single Sofa can adapt to any room and be an integral part of your interior design. This round shaped single sofa transmit both comfort and elegance, in any modern home decor.

PLUM is a throwback to the past with a contemporary touch. This fully upholstered Single Sofa celebrates grandeur and opulence highlighted by the synthetic leather that surrounds it. Place it in a modern living room and this leather single sofa will instantly add a sophisticated feel.

Often called the “Land of Castles”, Wales has some of the most impressive monuments of the Middle Ages. WALES Single Sofa pays tribute to the country’s history. Upholstered in cotton velvet and with a base in matte vintage brass, this curved velvet single sofa features a golden polished nailhead trim that makes it even more elegant.

Begonia is a beautiful flower from tropical countries. Inspired by its warm energies and the bold shape of its petals, our designers conceived BEGONIA 2 Seat Sofa. Its charming curves and soft cotton velvet upholstery make this the perfect curved back two seat sofa for an elegant modern interior design.

Cleopatra was a fierce woman in our history. She was a force to be reckoned with and always had poise and elegance. The DALYAN 2 Seat-Sofa, a channel-tufted sofa that breathes elegance. Upholstered in synthetic leather and legs in matte lacquer, this 2 seat sofa will bring elegance and poise into any room it is in.

The Maya civilization had maize as one of the primary elements of their culture. Personified as a woman, Maya’s Maize God was the inspiration behind MAYA 2 Seat Sofa. With legs in matte aged brass, this yellow velvet 2 seat sofa has the sensual and delicate forms of the goddess, making it the perfect seating solution for an elegant living room set.

Namib desert is one of the oldest and largest deserts in the world and NAMIB 2 Seat Sofa pays tribute to it. This powerful fabric sofa is upholstered in satin cotton and has legs in high gloss black lacquered, embodying an invigorating strength. The NAMIB Mid-Century Modern 2 Seater will be the focal point in your modern home design.

Nuka is a glacier in Alaska known for its sublime beauty. NUKA 2 Seat Sofa came to life inspired by this magnificent natural monument. Upholstered in velvet and legs in glossy gold leaf, this 2 seat sofa with a curved back will make any living room set or bedroom design look sleek and chic.

Taking inspiration from the interesting dialogues of the Bakaya people, whose word for “listen” is oka, our designers created OKA 2 Seat Sofa. This upholstered sofa in cotton velvet dazzles in its simplicity and will stand gracefully in a living room set. This brown 2 seat sofa will bring comfort to your modern contemporary home design.

In Roman mythology, Tellus is the goddess of the Earth. TELLUS 2 Seat Sofa honours its deity aura. The twill fabric, nailhead trim and back legs in matte lacquered add subtle sophistication, making this beige 2 seat sofa an elegant product able to fit in any modern home decor.

Zulu is the largest ethnic group in South Africa and the one who inspired the ZULU 2 Seat Sofa. Fully upholstered in cotton velvet, this button-tufted 2 seat sofa is full of personality, making it an unforgettable chair design whether the dining room decor it is placed in.

Bohol is the location of the famous Chocolate Hills, one of the Philippines' natural wonders. Inspired by this jewel of the Philippine islands, BOHOL Modular Sofa was created with the purpose to dazzle every modern interior. With a black lacquered recessed base, this contemporary modular sofa is the perfect choice to help maximise your living room space.

Borneo is the third-largest island in the world and the largest in Asia. Inspired by this amazing island, the BORNEO Sofa is upholstered in brown velvet, with pinewood legs stained in Wengue Matte. This modern velvet sofa will be the focal point of any living room design, being an excellent choice for an elegant and unique project.

GEORGE sofa is a time travel to King George Island, where the first church of Antarctica was proudly raised. This island is the largest of the South Shetland Islands and this modern velvet sofa with a base in aged brushed matte brass is a celebration of history through a distinctive design.

Inspired by the iconic Hera Temple, the HERA Three Round Sofa brings ancient Greek characters to modern spaces. This contemporary three-seater round sofa is perfect for a living room setting, be it a contemporary or modern design. Fully upholstered in twill, the HERA Three Round Sofa is the right choice to create a modern contemporary vibe.

Drawing inspiration from the iconic Hera Temple, the HERA Two Round Sofa brings ancient Greek characters to modern spaces. This contemporary two-seater round sofa is perfect for a living room setting, becoming the accent furniture item that will elevate any style. Fully upholstered in twill, the HERA Two Round Sofa will set the design tone for every living room it is in.

The Scottish Loch Maree is surrounded by a picturesque mountain with a rugged landscape. MAREE Sofa portrays that rough landscape softened by the tufted cotton velvet. This impressive modern living room sofa upholstered in velvet has legs in matte lacquer, giving a modern flair to the classic chesterfield sofa.

The Scottish Loch Maree is surrounded by a picturesque mountain with a rugged landscape. MAREE II Sofa portrays that rough landscape softened by the tufted velvet. The MAREE II is a fully upholstered velvet sofa, making it the perfect addition to a modern living room setting. The MAREE Velvet Sofa is designed to give a modern flair to the classic chesterfield sofa.

According to Greek mythology, Oreas is the God of the mountains. OREAS Sofa pays tribute to it; this channel-tufted sofa is fully upholstered in soft cotton velvet. With a modern contemporary design, this blue living room sofa will be the focal point in your living room design. The OREAS Sofa will elevate any room design it is set in.

Orleans is a small city in the north of France with an unmatched sense of being at home. Encouraged by this feeling, our designs bring to life the ORLEANS Modular Sofa. Upholstered in velvet, this modern sofa provides relaxing moments. Add it to your living room design and you can be sure it will become the centre of attention (and desires).

Otters are known for being playful animals, with a high capacity to adapt to the environment. Inspired by the nature of this animal, the OTTER Sofa can adapt to any room and be an integral part of your interior design. Its round shapes transmit both comfort and grandiosity, this orange cotton velvet sofa can be placed in a modern living room or a comfortable home cinema area.

Pearls are noble stones used in jewellery and interior design. Drawing inspiration from this magnificent colour, PEARL Three Round Sofa is fully upholstered in velvet and will shine like a glistering pearl in any living room setting. This three-seater round velvet sofa will give a regal as well as royal feel to any residential project.

Pearls are noble stones used in jewellery and interior design. Drawing inspiration from this magnificent colour, PEARL Round Two Sofa is fully upholstered in velvet and will be the centre of attention in any living room setting. Perfectly round, just like a pearl, the two-seater round velvet sofa is perfect for a modern and timeless living room design.

Often called the “Land of Castles”, Wales has some of the most impressive monuments of the Middle Ages. WALES Round 3 Sofa pays tribute to the country’s history. Fully upholstered in velvet, this round three-seater orange velvet sofa is perfect for any contemporary living room. The WALES Round 3-Seater Sofa is the ideal modern contemporary seating for a large area.

Often called the “Land of Castles”, Wales has some of the most impressive monuments of the Middle Ages. WALES ROUND 2 Sofa pays tribute to the country’s history. Fully upholstered in velvet, this curved two seater velvet sofa is perfect for any contemporary living room. The WALES Round 2-Seater Sofa will be the showstopper of your modern contemporary home design.

Borneo - the third-largest island in the world - derives its name from the Sanskrit word for 'water'. Inspired by this amazing island, the BORNEO Single Sofa is upholstered in brown velvet, with pinewood legs stained in Wengue Matte. This single 1 seater sofa is ideal for living rooms and reading corners, however, its modern design will stand out wherever it is set.

The Scottish Loch Maree is surrounded by a picturesque mountain with a rugged landscape. MAREE Single Sofa portrays that rough landscape softened by the tufted velvet upholstery. This impressive living room single sofa chair gives a modern flair to the classic chesterfield sofa, upholstered in velvet and legs in black matte lacquer.

The compelling rotation of the Earth around its axis inspired the creation of EARTH 2 Seat Sofa. Upholstered in cotton velvet, this 2 seat sofa with shelter-style arms has a unique hammered brass back with golden polished nailhead trim. It is this velvet 2 seat sofa that will make a statement in modern interior design.

The Inca Empire was a remarkable civilisation known for its brilliantly weaved and coloured clothes. INCA 2 Seat Sofa took inspiration from this compelling culture. Upholstered in cotton velvet and with legs in ebony wood veneer with a glossy varnish, this mid-century modern 2 seat sofa will stand beautifully in a living room set.
